column6: "THE RULES" A stand-alone story features the return of an old super-villain. Spider-Girl notices one of her friends is headed for disaster. Will her efforts to rein him in prove successful or destroy them both?!  32 PGS./ALL AGES...$2.99
column8: | inker:Sal Buscema | writer:Tom DeFalco | penciller (cover):Ron Frenz
